com.oneops.proxy.authz

Class UserRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oneops.proxy.authz.UserRepository

  • @Repository
public class UserRepository
extends Object
    User repository class to fetch OneOps user/team/group info. This is mainly used to enforce the ACL for application groups, which is the env nspath. Only the user with "Admin" privilege (ie, part of secrets-admin team) for an assembly is authorized to add/update/delete the secrets.

    Note: JOOQ query has 1:1 mapping with SQL and is very easy to understand. If you want to see the generated SQL (for debugging), add org.jooq.tools: DEBUG in application.yaml file.

    Author:
    Suresh
